transforms.name: vite:load-fallback
vite:css
transforms.result: div.top-theme{font-family:"Noto Serif Display";font-size:15rem;font-weight:400;line-height:100%;margin:15rem auto auto;text-align:center}span.nbsp{content:" "}@media screen and (max-width:820px){div.top-theme{margin-top:10rem;text-align:left;width:-moz-min-content;width:min-content}}div.top-theme.displayed{animation-duration:4s;animation-fill-mode:forwards;animation-name:displayTheme;animation-timing-function:ease-in-out}@keyframes displayTheme{0%{transform:scale(.7)}to{transform:scale(1)}}div.theme-desc{font-size:1.6rem;margin-top:2rem;text-align:center}div.theme-desc span{font-size:2.4rem}div#to-works{align-items:center;border:1px solid #fff;border-radius:50%;cursor:pointer;display:flex;font-size:2rem;height:12rem;justify-content:center;margin:7rem auto auto;position:relative;transform-origin:bottom;transition:.5s;width:12rem}div#to-works:before{background-color:#fff;border-radius:100%;content:"";height:95%;left:2.5%;opacity:0;position:absolute;top:2.5%;transition:.5s;width:95%;z-index:-1}div#to-works:hover{color:#000}div#to-works:hover:before{opacity:1}div#to-works:hover div.circle{opacity:0}div.circle-pos{animation-duration:5s;animation-iteration-count:infinite;animation-name:circle-rotation;animation-timing-function:linear;bottom:50%;height:calc(50% + 2.5rem);position:absolute;transform:rotate(90deg);transform-origin:bottom;width:4rem}div.circle-pos.small{animation-duration:3s;height:calc(50% + 1.5rem);transform:rotate(45deg);width:2.5rem}@keyframes circle-rotation{0%{transform:rotate(0deg)}to{transform:rotate(1turn)}}div.circle{animation-duration:5s;animation-iteration-count:infinite;animation-name:circle-size;animation-timing-function:linear;border:1px solid #fff;border-radius:50%;height:4rem;transition:.5s;width:4rem}div.circle.small{height:2.5rem;width:2.5rem}@keyframes circle-size{0%{transform:scale(.7)}50%{transform:scale(1.2)}to{transform:scale(.7)}}div.top-content{margin-top:10rem}div.content-title{font-size:4rem;text-align:center}div.content-txt{font-size:1.6rem;margin-top:2rem;text-align:center}@media screen and (max-width:500px){br.sp{display:none}}div.works-arr{display:flex;gap:2rem;justify-content:center;margin-top:2rem}@media screen and (max-width:500px){div.works-arr{flex-wrap:wrap}}div.work-image-container{aspect-ratio:5/3;background-color:#393939;border-radius:2rem;display:grid;min-width:30rem;place-items:center;width:50rem}div.work-image-container img{max-width:100%;width:90%}div.view-detail{cursor:pointer;font-size:1.6rem;height:1rem;line-height:1.6rem;margin:5rem auto auto;position:relative;text-align:center;width:10rem}div.view-detail:before{border-bottom:1px solid #fff;border-right:2.5px solid #fff;content:"";height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:100%;transform:skew(60deg);width:100%;z-index:-1}div.skills-container{display:flex;margin-top:2rem}@media screen and (max-width:500px){div.skills-container{display:block}}dl.skill-content{border:.5px solid #777;flex:1;padding:2rem;text-align:center}dl.skill-content:not(:first-of-type){margin-left:-.5px}dt.skill{border-bottom:.5px solid #777;font-size:3rem}dd.skill-detail{font-size:2rem;margin-left:0}dd.skill-detail:first-of-type{margin-top:2rem}
